system.description:
You breathe a stream of flesheating maggots at a close target. Target must make a CON vs. your spellcasting check check or take [[/r 1d6]] damage and suffer DISADV on attacks and spellcasting checks as long as they are covered in maggots.

Target continues to take [[/r 1d6]] damage each round until the effect ends or until they take an action to brush them off.

@UUID[Compendium.unnatural-selection.chant-and-spell-effects.Item.9KUYhwrAQ5QGAHV5]{Spell Effect: Grub Geyser}
